shortdesc.i: The Sensors object allows you to get access to system level sensors and attributes of the BlackBerry device.

conbody.p: The sensors object has various event listeners for sensors on the device.

p.pre:
<script type="text/javascript">

                function compassCallback(sensor, data) {
                     alert("Current azimuth: " + data.value);
                }

                blackberry.sensors.setOptions("devicecompass", { delay: 1000 });
                document.addEventListener("devicecompass", compassCallback);
                blackberry.sensors.setOptions("devicecompass", { background: true, batching: true });
               </script>

link.linktext: Sample that demonstrates how to use the BlackBerry Sensors API [BlackBerry on GitHub].
